Html:
I noticed that the Mage model had an option to add shadow priests (basically mana/5). Are there any plans to incorporate this for the Warlock model? I ask because mana/5 for a warlock means less life tapping, which translates into more time spent towards doing damage. Yet mana/5 has absolutely no effect on the warlock model currently -- even if I modify an item to include mana/5, the DPS does not change.

Thanks!
Arnath is working on this, definitely.
